title: My Life in Weeks
excerpt: 👋 Hi, I’m Gina. This is a map of my life, where each week I’ve been alive is a little box. Tap a box to see what I was doing where that week.
text: BirthTeens20s30s40s50s60s70s80s90s100👋 Hi, I’m Gina. This is a map of my life, where each week I’ve been alive is a little box. Tap a box to see what I was doing where that week.📍 Read more about Life in Weeks at Wait But Why. I adapted the code that generated this page from Buster Benson.🌱 This life and this map are a work in progress. I’ll update it as I go.🍯 “I always get to where I am going by walking away from where I have been.” – Winnie the Pooh

👋 Hi, I’m Gina. This is a map of my life, where each week I’ve been alive is a little box. Tap a box to see what I was doing where that week.

📍 Read more about Life in Weeks at Wait But Why. I adapted the code that generated this page from Buster Benson.

🌱 This life and this map are a work in progress. I’ll update it as I go.

🍯 “I always get to where I am going by walking away from where I have been.” – Winnie the Pooh
